revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Aqua Hideout |image = [[File:Aqua Hideout.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Aqua Hideout. |tokens = 30,000 |location = North of Route 124 }} '''Aqua Hideout''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 490,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=7|<center>N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt ||[[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt ||[[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |}

Base Health |- | colspan=2|<center> N/A || [[File:Aqua_Admin_(matt).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Matt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || <center> 900,000 |- |}

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 4 || 42.84% || 41.14% || 34.29% |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || 2 || 21.42% || 20.57% || 17.14% |- | {{Pokemon|Electrode|mimic}} || N/A || 10.71% || 10.29% || 8.57% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Lureball}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.60% || 5.00% |- | {{Bag2|Diveball}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.60% || 5.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Dread Plate}} || 2 || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || 2 || 0.33% || 0.53% || 1.33% |- | {{Bag2|Duskball}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.66% |- | {{Bag2|Nestball}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.66% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.06% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
